messages.title: Standing up for the law-abiding majority
messages.content: People across the country are fed up with our criminal justice system. They feel that it's just not on their side anymore. Violence, disorder and anti-social behaviour make their days more miserable. Labour's lax on crime policies have seen thousands of people let off with cautions. We can't go on like this.

messages.title: The NHS: our number one priority
messages.content: When David Cameron became leader of the Conservative Party four-and-a-half years ago, he made clear that the NHS was our number one priority - and it has remained our priority ever since.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promising a new era of transparency and immediate action against crime and anti-social behavior.

Commitment to the NHS as the top priority, increasing patient power through choice and transparency, slashing bureaucracy by scrapping tick boxes and targets; and empowering doctors and nurses to focus on results.

issues.health: When David Cameron became leader of the Conservative Party four-and-a-half years ago, he made clear that the NHS was our number one priority - and it has remained our priority ever since.

images.caption: Michael Gove engaging with community members and addressing issues of public safety and health.
